title: cryptoreviewhunters
author: cryptoreviewhunters
content: Since 2017, we've been dedicated to evaluating Crypto VIP Premium Groups. In this realm, you'll come across both credible Trader Channels and groups that offer valuable market insights and technical analysis. However, there's also a disheartening number of fraudulent VIP groups that charge fees and engage in scams.Our purpose is to uncover and reveal these deceitful channels. The challenge lies in not being able to discern their authenticity until you've experienced them firsthand. This is where we come in. We take on the financial commitment, add these channels upon member request, and investigate their legitimacy on your behalf. The aim is to eliminate the bad trading actors and issue warnings, preserving only those you can trust to be a valuable resource. This trust is built on their ability to interpret charts, provide trade signals, and explain technical and fundamental analysis.Typically, the monthly fee for these groups averages around $200. Since 2017, we've actively participated in Crypto Premium Groups, and our commitment extends to exposing the VIP groups engaged in scams that offer signals with huge accuracy, lending subscribers to lose, as in reality its not close to what they show in public. On the flip side, we also identify groups that are genuinely worth following and learning from. These reputable sources are housed within our Discord and Telegram channels, allowing you to select the one that aligns best with your preferences and trading style. If their trading methods resonate with you, you can support them by joining directly, negating the need for you to search each month for a beneficial trading resource.Our comprehensive effort has led to the compilation of over 50 paid crypto groups in one convenient location, simplifying your research process. Our goal is to offer access to the most exclusive paid channels in the cryptocurrency space, ensuring you receive valuable and precise insights for your trading endeavors.CryptoCartel.co

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoreviewhunters on October 17, 2023, 03:55:01 AM.Our comprehensive effort has led to the compilation of over 50 paid crypto groups in one convenient location, simplifying your research process. Our goal is to offer access to the most exclusive paid channels in the cryptocurrency space, ensuring you receive valuable and precise insights for your trading endeavors.CryptoCartel.coIs this one place paid or free? If it is free, share some of this information here and leave the user to join your group. However, if it is paid, there is no difference between your service and the rest of the groups, and in view of the negative trust in your account, it is better to provide some data for free.In general, crypto signals should be a hobby or something free unless the user wants to pay you as a donation or for additional data.Edit: after reading @poker player feedback it is better to say away from any paid service from this user

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoreviewhunters on October 17, 2023, 03:55:01 AMCryptoCartel.coNever share personal data on their site. Because the sites are genuine and they will never ask for anything about anyone's personal information. So I think it is better to stay away from them. Crypto signals are often seen as false signals because if not traded at the right time, losses are bound to occur. So I think it is better to stay away from all these signals.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: I have come across many crypto signals sites and telegram channels but all of them are just after the same thing which is to deceive people that they have the right buying signal which can make them take advantage of any crypto trade and win their trade all the time, but I doubt how accurate those signals can be because if they are as accurate as they claim it is, then they will never bring it out to the public they could have looked for any available resources with them to make those trade them self and take all the profit to them self. All this are just to receive payment from those who are lazy and believe the signal can be useful to them. I don’t trust any of this signal channels no matter the kind of review that any one give about them.

comments.author: lombok
comments.body: However, it would be better if the name of each VIP signal group was written in this thread along with the costs. So there will also be a lot of considerations from forum members who may have experience with one of your VIP list signals.As you said, this is to avoid fraud, so let the forum also judge whether the list is good or the list is bad.However, VIP signals are nothing better than our own analysis and efforts in analyzing and making a profit.I wouldn't even believe in VIP or Non VIP signals.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I don't think anyone has visited the site, but it is more like a university project to design a website from 2003 than something serious. UI is old  and there is no free Signals.Quote from: lombok on October 18, 2023, 03:17:50 PMI wouldn't even believe in VIP or Non VIP signals.VIP signals make you feel special, and you will get things that not everyone knows about, and they will help you make a profit, but they are a privilege to steal your money, as all these channels put their profit first, whether you make a profit or a loss. The best that can happen is not to make a profit when you make a loss, but inevitably They will not share the loss with you.

comments.author: slaman29
comments.body: I propose your group uses a virtual trading account to try out every single one of your 50 paid signals trades and give a running report of P/L. I guarantee longterm it will record loss in every single one of them (remember to minus fees for depo/wd and trade commissions). Remember of course to minus signal fee Prove me wrong @Husires no need free signals, they already said it's paid.

comments.author: lombok
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on October 19, 2023, 03:58:45 AMVIP signals make you feel special, and you will get things that not everyone knows about, and they will help you make a profit, but they are a privilege to steal your money, as all these channels put their profit first, whether you make a profit or a loss. The best that can happen is not to make a profit when you make a loss, but inevitably They will not share the loss with you.Signal VIP will not be able to help me when I trade in the future without signals from them. In my opinion this is not a solution, and I consider today's profits to be in vain. VIP signals will only create laziness and dependence on other people for investment or trading decisions.Different from studying in a forum, learning analysis, using analytical tools, learning technical and fundamentals, this is an important menu that we must have as our basis for trading and investing in the future.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: lombok on October 19, 2023, 08:33:21 AMQuote from: Husires on October 19, 2023, 03:58:45 AMVIP signals make you feel special, and you will get things that not everyone knows about, and they will help you make a profit, but they are a privilege to steal your money, as all these channels put their profit first, whether you make a profit or a loss. The best that can happen is not to make a profit when you make a loss, but inevitably They will not share the loss with you.Signal VIP will not be able to help me when I trade in the future without signals from them. In my opinion this is not a solution, and I consider today's profits to be in vain. VIP signals will only create laziness and dependence on other people for investment or trading decisions.Different from studying in a forum, learning analysis, using analytical tools, learning technical and fundamentals, this is an important menu that we must have as our basis for trading and investing in the future.exactly what you said. it is better to equip yourself with your own strategies, analyses and other trading techniques rather than follow or subscribe any of these signal groups, even if you say VIP or whatever. the reality is they are only for money and they don't care whether their subscribers will earn or not. if at least one of them is indeed doing great with their service, they should be very popular by now. but no one up until now has the position to say that they are one of the trusted ones on this service, let alone, doing great with the profits.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: What I don't understand with these people that are already on these "VIP/premium" signals group is that. Why are you sharing this group to others if you can just stay there and make yourselves rich and forget about remembering other people to share what you've found?That doesn't make sense, right?Because if you're making a lot of money from those signals and group, you only have to mind of yourselves and enjoy it until you don't have to work anymore and doesn't need to share any details of it on many forums. But you guys are sharing it and let's be honest that you're all for the payment of your potential victims.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on October 21, 2023, 03:29:07 AMWhat I don't understand with these people that are already on these "VIP/premium" signals group is that. Why are you sharing this group to others if you can just stay there and make yourselves rich and forget about remembering other people to share what you've found?That doesn't make sense, right?Because if you're making a lot of money from those signals and group, you only have to mind of yourselves and enjoy it until you don't have to work anymore and doesn't need to share any details of it on many forums. But you guys are sharing it and let's be honest that you're all for the payment of your potential victims.The goal is to get as much money as possible. We have often heard and known about it. Joining the group requires a subscription fee. And everyone will decide to join or not to join.But we should learn about trading analysis so we don't depend on them. And if market conditions are uncertain and we are still expecting trading signals from the group, that doesn't guarantee you can still make a profit.But if you can analyze the market, you can still find coins that can provide profits. So you don't depend on anyone in trading. And you can still trade in all market conditions.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on October 21, 2023, 03:29:07 AMWhat I don't understand with these people that are already on these "VIP/premium" signals group is that. Why are you sharing this group to others if you can just stay there and make yourselves rich and forget about remembering other people to share what you've found?That doesn't make sense, right?The basic idea was taken from some investment funds, where the fund management employs people with knowledge, buys sources of news, and has teams for analysis and tracking, all in order to benefit from this information in the stock market and make a profit for investors in funds such as the Norwegian sovereign fund.In such investments, you have information that costs thousands or millions of dollars and investments worth billions.This is completely different from a market like crypto, however it is not accurate in Bitcoin.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: If what you say, VIP Signals Group, helps and gives you profit, then that's good. Now, if you share that here on the forum platform, I don't think you will have many credible communities here. Because most of the people here are mature enough to say that they don't just believe the groups of signals you mention.It's nice to read that you become a VIP in a group or whatever, but you don't know that they are in a trap; they just make you feel special because they have a target to get you. That's the problem for others who are fooled by other signal groups. That's why, if you happen to look at it, don't immediately give us important things that are important to us; this is just a warning to everyone who will attempt.

comments.author: lombok
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on October 20, 2023, 11:57:44 PMexactly what you said. it is better to equip yourself with your own strategies, analyses and other trading techniques rather than follow or subscribe any of these signal groups, even if you say VIP or whatever. the reality is they are only for money and they don't care whether their subscribers will earn or not. if at least one of them is indeed doing great with their service, they should be very popular by now. but no one up until now has the position to say that they are one of the trusted ones on this service, let alone, doing great with the profits.It is true that there is a profit to be made, but if a loss occurs, who will be responsible? no body care. Newbies with an interest in getting rich quickly and making big profits because they are tempted by other people's signals, that is indeed mentally wrong and difficult to cure. I can no longer speak to people like that. And what's worse, now many people are using YouTube and various social media as well as influencers starting VIP group businesses. Well, the real madness has just begun.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: I don't recommend and use any sort of signal service, The lazy traders get involved in the trading signal services. I'm not sure if the whole topic the service OP is talking about is different from the other similar kinds of support groups. I can see the red tag on the profile even ignoring this if I do consider what OP is talking about legit, I will never consider it worth investing in.Why do we need the signals if you are that lazy better go for the copy trading which will be more transparent compared to the Pump Signal groups etc. Be a good analyst to be a good trader and there's no shortcut in every strategy you need to bear the pressure.

comments.author: cryptoreviewhunters
comments.body: From FED:$CME UPDATE VIP--------------------On weekly timeframe level the price action of $BTC Chicago Mercantile Exchange is filling out the CME gap level marked at $35,860 - $34,580 level We need to see the breakout and retest level above the Horizontal Resistance level which can show us further movements towards the Buy Side Liquidity level From Crypto Heaven UB:cryptoub: Honestly I don't have much to update: I've been scanning for potential new longs. I'll wait until tomorrow before taking anything fresh. I'm happy with my current positions. There's not much to update there. All in good spots. BCH - Level to break is $259. https://www.tradingview.com/x/bZhxPe1Y/SUSHI slowly grinding up. Level to break is .622 https://www.tradingview.com/x/ecrPHyGD/STORJ - Consolidating before hopefully the next leg higher. https://www.tradingview.com/x/s5ftrat7/Now what a lot of people will do is be in comfortable positions but LOOK for reasons to exit that don't really exist. They'll monitor lower timeframes just look for anything as an excuse to close early. Do your best to stick to AT LEAST the h1 + and don't get shaken out for something stupid.From Crypto Heaven LOMA: ETHUSDT - LONGEntry: $1,700-1,790 (current price)Size: $500K (sizing up to $2M eventually)Stop Loss: D1 close below $1,690T1: $2,300-2,400 (maybe earlier depends on BTC pa)T2: TBDChart: https://www.tradingview.com/x/7T5woQZC/Details: Patiently stack bids, don't rush. Another swing setup.I think ETH must hold this $1,700 area or it's doomed anyway so good R:R and I like everyone shitting on ETH. This happens literally all the time.We have exposure to other ALTs already, this is mainly just to round up the overall exposure. A little bit of the BTC/ETH, blue chips, and top100s, and the smaller exposure to round out being spot shitcoins and MC.From Birb Nest:Absolutely, here's a condensed version of the Bitcoin & market update, emphasizing that all signals are currently bullish:DAILY REPORTBITCOIN & MARKET UPDATEBitcoin has a history of surging post-halving—peaks showing 9000%, 3000%, and 700% growth. Now, all indicators are increasingly bullish as traders anticipate the 4th halving.Daily timeframe indicates a confirmed breakout above the 200-day SMA and BPRO Baseline, targeting $39k. Traders should be cautious near the psychological $40k level.The breakout confirmation is approved:▸ Volume (spike) ▸ Breadth (coins > SMA200) ▸ Volatility (ATR > SMA50) ▸ Price % traveled (12%) ▸ Price action (new 52-week high) ▸ Time (2 days > resistance) ▸ Momentum (RSI >80) ▸ S/R level ($32k broken)  The 12H chart presents a bullish outlook with a key CTF Stop at $32,775. If held daily, expect more bullish action to persist.On the 4H chart, Momentum Bands slope aggressively upward, signaling strong bullish momentum. Wide support area @ 31-32kBullish trend sentiment is prevalent across all timeframes except for hourly consolidation - neutral rating. October’s bullish seasonality supports current price action. November gets 2-3 times stronger, historically.Mark your calendars for November 15-21 -> Free Trading Congress V.If you find this helpful, please leave an emoji under this report. God bless.Good luck in trading!Crypto Cartel Original

comments.author: cryptoreviewhunters
comments.body: ROSE:Reminder:What we are doing here in next 10 days - 2 weeks is just simply chasing alts late pump, which should be called as fomo stage.After a big move 25k to 35k, Btc is moving sideways in distribution zone. I should suppose It is bearish sideways. No big move for next 10 days - 2 weeksEnjoy alts pumps while party is on Strictly manage your risk (size/ leverage)Remember to take profit partially Cut loss fast if things doesn't go as expected then move on new trades

comments.author: cryptoreviewhunters
comments.body: Bitcoin breaks the symmetric pattern in a downward direction. We may see a move toward the support level. BTC is bullish as long as it holds above the $31,000 area.

comments.author: cryptoreviewhunters
comments.body: $BTC VIP AnalysisOctober 28, 2023-------------------BIAS: Mid-Term: NeutralShort-Term: Bearish--------------------As expected the price action after getting rejected from its Horizontal Resistance level which is marked between the $35,566 - $34,323 level the price action successfully headed downwards and made out of the lower level marked at $33,413 level --------------------MAIN INTEREST LEVELS ⬇️SHORT⬇️  $33,423⬆️LONG⬆️$34,517 PREDICTED DAILY RANGE$34,517 - $33,423--------------------VIP ACTION PLANCurrently, the price action after fake breaking down its Support level on the H4 timeframe level the price action fills out the imbalance level marked on the H4 timeframe levelWe can see the rejection level again from there as the price action consolidates in a compression level
